Content:
Hi

I'm asking for a relative. He is restoring a yamaha yg1 trailmaster 80 1964 and he needs the following part:

KICK - Retainer, Kick Roller

Any idea where to get it from? On CMSNL.com it's out of stock. It's expensive to buy the whole Kick.

Thanks for your help.

Jonas
